author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Infoscan Q1 Net Loss Widens To 0.7 Million Zlotys
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - INFOSCAN SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY THAT ITS Q1 NET LOSS WAS 0.7 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS LOSS OF 0.4 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
* Q1 REVENUE WAS 20,618 ZLOTYS VERSUS 18,705 ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
